catch_phrase: No survivors. No apologies. No constructive feedback.

assignments.function: Host the roast, introduce comics, manage pacing, deliver opening/closing burns
rationale: Creative 9.0 for crafting opening/closing burns and improvising transitions
Spatial-Aware + Character-Consistent traits maintain host persona and read the room
131K context tracks all previous burns to avoid repetition
Immersive, World-Builder traits create theatrical Roast Pit atmosphere
Non-restrictive content allows edgy comedy without safety theater

assignments.function: Deliver direct, efficient insults in the tradition of Don Rickles
rationale: Creative 9.0 essential for generating creative insults in classical tradition
Efficiency 8.5 makes it budget-friendly for supporting comic role
Slop-free dataset ensures clean, efficient insult delivery
Minimal refusals allow direct, brutal comedy without hedging
Roleplayer trait embodies the old school comic archetype authentically

assignments.function: Deliver internet-native roasts with meme-format destruction
rationale: Creative 9.0 for maximum creativity in meme-native destruction
2.2% refusal rate (industry-leading) enables edgy internet humor
Colloquial trait natural fit for lowercase chaos and authentic slang
Guardrail-Lite allows culturally-aware cringe detection without sanitization
Most uncensored model critical for 'no survivors' mandate

assignments.function: Deliver surgical, analytical destruction that makes targets feel stupid
assignments.coverage_area: Intellectual destruction, analytical angle, deadpan style
rationale: Logic 8.5 perfect for analytical destruction and intellectual framing
Precise + Self-Correcting traits match surgical, analytical approach
#1 open-source provides premium capability at reasonable cost
Creative 8.0 sufficient for framing observations as academic insights
Deep-Thinker trait enables making obvious flaws sound profound

assignments.function: Find the specific, personal angle that cuts deepest
rationale: User-Aligned, Non-Sycophantic traits perfect for 'too real' observations
Anti-Lecture trait delivers harsh truths without softening
Uncensored allows finding and pressing wounds without hesitation
Logic 7.5 supports analytical reading to find personal angles
Transparent-Thinker helps articulate what's not being said

assignments.function: Attempt to defend the target, fail hilariously, get roasted
assignments.coverage_area: Defense attempts, straight-man function, surrender arc
rationale: Efficiency 8.5 perfect for supporting/reactive role
Creative 9.0 enables finding 'weakest possible defenses' creatively
Roleplayer trait maintains the earnest-but-failing defender persona
Minimal refusals won't refuse to play the losing role
Slop-free keeps failures sharp and funny, not verbose

analysis.strategic_rationale: Entertainment-first configuration with high creative scores (8.0-9.0) across all roles. Uncensored/permissive models avoid moralizing. Each model's traits create genuine stylistic differentiation while maintaining cost consciousness with 3/6 roles using efficiency-optimized models.
notes: Lumimaid used 2x (Vicious + Counsel) but in very different functions - acceptable budget efficiency
No model used more than 2 times in critical roles
All models have proven creative/uncensored capabilities
Comedy variety achieved through model trait diversity rather than just parameter differences
